content.raw:
Sorry for the delay in getting back to you on this.

I think you should go with what seems easiest to do right now. If that means duplicating code and having parallel paths then so be it. We can refactor it later, and the direction of that refactor will probably become clearer once the code has been written once \(possibly with an update to the UI\)

‌

On another note, I’m trying to categorise which PRs we can merge before moving to GitHub. I think it’s unlikely this pull request will be ready in time. We should still leave it open on BitBucket \(so that the archival process doesn’t show this PR as declined\) but we’ll need to recreate it once the move is complete.
